abstract: Some investors like Douglas A. Kass, the founder and president of Seabreeze Partners Management, attribute late-day market swings to leveraged exchange-traded funds.
snippet: Some investors like Douglas A. Kass, the founder and president of Seabreeze Partners Management, attribute late-day market swings to leveraged exchange-traded funds.
lead_paragraph: Did you watch the markets on Monday? In the last 18 minutes of trading, the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index jumped more than 10 points with no news to account for the rally. If you were left scratching your head, you were not alone.
